mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_BLOG( BLOG_SEQ, TITLE, CONTENTS, REG_DDTM, REG_ID, DEL_YN, TAGS, BLOG_CTG_CD ) SELECT (IFNULL(MAX(BLOG_SEQ), 0) +1) BLOG_SEQ, #{title}, #{contents}, DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), #{register_id}, 'N', #{tags}, #{ctg_cd} FROM TB_BLOG
mapper.select:
SELECT BLOG_SEQ, TITLE, CONTENTS, DATE_FORMAT(REG_DDTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') REG_DDTM, REG_ID, DEL_YN, TIMESTAMPDIFF(day, DATE_FORMAT(REG_DDTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i'), DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') ) TIME_DIFF_HOUR, REPLACE(TAGS, ' ', '') TAGS, BLOG_CTG_CD, (SELECT BLOG_CTG_NM FROM TB_BLOG_CTG_CD WHERE A.BLOG_CTG_CD = BLOG_CTG_CD) BLOG_CTG_NM FROM TB_BLOG A WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'

ORDER BY BLOG_SEQ DESC LIMIT ${currentPageNo} , ${pageSize}

SELECT BLOG_SEQ, TITLE, CONTENTS, DATE_FORMAT(REG_DDTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') REG_DDTM, REG_ID, DEL_YN, TIMESTAMPDIFF(day, DATE_FORMAT(REG_DDTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i'), DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') ) TIME_DIFF_HOUR, TAGS, REPLACE(TAGS, ' ', '') TAGS_TRIM, BLOG_CTG_CD, (SELECT BLOG_CTG_NM FROM TB_BLOG_CTG_CD WHERE A.BLOG_CTG_CD = BLOG_CTG_CD) BLOG_CTG_NM, (SELECT MIN(BLOG_SEQ) NEXT_SEQ FROM TB_BLOG WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND BLOG_SEQ > A.BLOG_SEQ ) NEXT_SEQ, (SELECT MAX(BLOG_SEQ) NEXT_SEQ FROM TB_BLOG WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND BLOG_SEQ < A.BLOG_SEQ ) PREV_SEQ FROM TB_BLOG A WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND BLOG_SEQ = #{blog_seq}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_BLOG SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENTS = #{contents}, TAGS = #{tags}, BLOG_CTG_CD = #{ctg_cd}, UPDATE_DDTM = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') WHERE BLOG_SEQ = #{blog_seq}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT REPLACE(TAGS, ' ', '') TAGS FROM TB_BLOG WHERE LENGTH(TAGS) > 0 AND DEL_YN = 'N'
